text: Ægypt is a series of four novels written by American author John Crowley. ==Volumes== Title Year Notes The Solitudes 1987 Originally published in 1987 as Ægypt, despite Crowley's objections. Revised 2007. World Fantasy Award nominee, 1988; Arthur C. Clarke Award nominee, 1988 Love & Sleep 1994 World Fantasy Award nominee, 1995 Dæmonomania 2000 Endless Things 2007 Locus Fantasy Award nominee, 2008 ==References== Category:1980s books Category:1990s books Category:2000s books
title: Ægypt
